abstract.t: When using IPv6 within a single L2 network segment it is assumed that for good network behavior, the available routers attached to the segment are valid routers. A rogue Router Advertisement (RA) [1] however could be sent by accident by a misconfigured network device, or on purpose by malicious devices. This document proposes a solution to reduce the threat of rogue RAs by enabling layer 2 devices to provide forward RAs received over designated ports.
